snippet: The Ohio Art Company, which has produced or owned the Etch A Sketch for more than five decades, has sold the classic toy to a Toronto-based firm.
abstract: Ohio Art Company sells its classic toy Etch A Sketch to Spin Master for undisclosed price.
lead_paragraph: The Ohio Art Company, which has produced or owned the Etch A Sketch for more than five decades, has sold the classic toy to a Toronto-based firm.

headline.print_headline: Ohio Art Sells Etch A Sketch to Spin Master
headline.main: Ohio Art Sells Etch A Sketch to Spin Master
